instructions.name: InitializeProgramConfig
instructions.description: Initialize the global program configuration

instructions.name: SetProgramConfigAuthority
instructions.description: Set the program config authority

instructions.name: SetProgramConfigSmartAccountCreationFee
instructions.description: Set the fee for creating smart accounts

instructions.name: SetProgramConfigTreasury
instructions.description: Set the program treasury address

instructions.name: CreateSmartAccount
instructions.description: Create a new multisig smart account

instructions.name: AddSignerAsAuthority
instructions.description: Add a signer to the smart account via settings authority

instructions.name: RemoveSignerAsAuthority
instructions.description: Remove a signer from the smart account via settings authority

instructions.name: SetTimeLockAsAuthority
instructions.description: Set the time lock duration via settings authority

instructions.name: ChangeThresholdAsAuthority
instructions.description: Change the approval threshold via settings authority

instructions.name: SetNewSettingsAuthorityAsAuthority
instructions.description: Transfer settings authority to a new address

instructions.name: SetArchivalAuthorityAsAuthority
instructions.description: Set the archival authority via settings authority

instructions.name: AddSpendingLimitAsAuthority
instructions.description: Add a spending limit via settings authority

instructions.name: RemoveSpendingLimitAsAuthority
instructions.description: Remove a spending limit via settings authority

instructions.name: CreateSettingsTransaction
instructions.description: Create a transaction to change smart account settings

instructions.name: ExecuteSettingsTransaction
instructions.description: Execute an approved settings change transaction

instructions.name: ExecuteSettingsTransactionSync
instructions.description: Execute a settings transaction synchronously (single-step)

instructions.name: CreateTransaction
instructions.description: Create a new transaction for the smart account to execute

instructions.name: CreateTransactionBuffer
instructions.description: Create a buffer for large transaction messages

instructions.name: ExtendTransactionBuffer
instructions.description: Append data to an existing transaction buffer

instructions.name: CloseTransactionBuffer
instructions.description: Close a transaction buffer and reclaim rent

instructions.name: CreateTransactionFromBuffer
instructions.description: Create a transaction from a previously filled buffer

instructions.name: ExecuteTransaction
instructions.description: Execute an approved transaction via CPI

instructions.name: ExecuteTransactionSync
instructions.description: Execute a transaction synchronously (deprecated, use v2)

instructions.name: ExecuteTransactionSyncV2
instructions.description: Execute a transaction synchronously (single-step with policy)

instructions.name: CloseTransaction
instructions.description: Close a transaction account and reclaim rent

instructions.name: CloseEmptyPolicyTransaction
instructions.description: Close an empty policy transaction and reclaim rent

instructions.name: CreateBatch
instructions.description: Create a batch for grouping multiple transactions

instructions.name: AddTransactionToBatch
instructions.description: Add a transaction to an existing batch

instructions.name: ExecuteBatchTransaction
instructions.description: Execute a single transaction within a batch

instructions.name: CloseBatchTransaction
instructions.description: Close a batch transaction and reclaim rent

instructions.name: CloseBatch
instructions.description: Close an entire batch and reclaim rent

instructions.name: CreateProposal
instructions.description: Create a proposal for a pending transaction

instructions.name: ActivateProposal
instructions.description: Activate a draft proposal for voting

instructions.name: ApproveProposal
instructions.description: Cast an approval vote on a proposal

instructions.name: RejectProposal
instructions.description: Cast a rejection vote on a proposal

instructions.name: CancelProposal
instructions.description: Cancel an active proposal

instructions.name: UseSpendingLimit
instructions.description: Execute a transfer using a pre-approved spending limit

instructions.name: CloseSettingsTransaction
instructions.description: Close a settings transaction and reclaim rent

instructions.name: LogEvent
instructions.description: Emit a program event log

instructions.name: IdlCreateAccount
instructions.description: Create an IDL account (Anchor standard)

instructions.name: IdlResizeAccount
instructions.description: Resize an IDL account

instructions.name: IdlCloseAccount
instructions.description: Close an IDL account

instructions.name: IdlCreateBuffer
instructions.description: Create an IDL buffer for uploading

instructions.name: IdlWrite
instructions.description: Write IDL data to buffer

instructions.name: IdlSetAuthority
instructions.description: Set IDL account authority

instructions.name: IdlSetBuffer
instructions.description: Set the IDL from a buffer
